trans-unit.source: Provides facilities for managing input languages in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
Additional languages can be registered by using the Regional and Language Options control panel.
trans-unit.target: Des langues supplémentaires peuvent être inscrits à l’aide du Panneau de configuration Options régionales et linguistiques.

trans-unit.source: From the Languages tab, select "Text Services and input languages", then click the "Details" button to register additional languages.
trans-unit.target: Sous l’onglet langues, sélectionnez « Services de texte et langues d’entrée », puis cliquez sur le bouton « Détails » pour enregistrer des langues supplémentaires.

trans-unit.source: The following dialog appears.
trans-unit.target: La boîte de dialogue suivante s’affiche.

trans-unit.source: ![Text services and input languages dialog.](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Text services and input languages dialog.")
trans-unit.target: ![Texte d’entrée et de services langues boîte de dialogue. ] (~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Dialogue de langues d’entrée et les services de texte.")

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> to set the input language of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> pour définir la langue d’entrée d’un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> élément.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for currently available input languages.
An enumerator for currently available input languages, or **null** if no input languages are available.
trans-unit.target: Un énumérateur pour les langues d’entrée actuellement disponibles, ou **null** si aucune langue d’entrée n’est disponibles.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété n’a aucune valeur par défaut.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> to enumerate the available input languages.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> pour énumérer les langues d’entrée disponibles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the input language manager associated with the current context.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager" /> object associated with the current context.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager" /> objet associé au contexte actuel.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété n’a aucune valeur par défaut.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> to access the language manager associated with the current context.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> pour accéder au Gestionnaire de langue associé au contexte actuel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current input language.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the currently selected input language.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> objet représentant la langue d’entrée actuellement sélectionnée.

trans-unit.source: This property may not be set to **null**.
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété ne peut pas être définie **null**.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture" />.
The following example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> to get the current input language.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> langue d’entrée pour obtenir en cours.

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the input language.
Returns the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage" /> attached property for a specified dependency object.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the input language for the specified dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> to get the input language of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> pour obtenir la langue d’entrée d’un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> élément.

trans-unit.source: Raised when <paramref name="target" /> is **null**.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage" />.
Returns the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage" /> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The current value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage" /> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when <paramref name="target" /> is **null**.
Occurs when a change of input language is completed.
Occurs when a change of input language is initiated.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage" /> attached property.
An object that specifies the input language to register.
This object must implement the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.IInputLanguageSource" /> interface.
Registers an input language source with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager" />.
Raised when <paramref name="inputLanguageSource" /> is **null**.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the new input language.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the previous input language.
Report the completion of a change of input language to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager" />.
Raised when <paramref name="newLanguageId" /> or <paramref name="previousLanguageId" /> is **null**.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the new input language.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the previous input language.
Report the initiation of a change of input language to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager" />.
**true** to indicate that the reported change of input language was accepted; otherwise, **false**.
Raised when <paramref name="newLanguageId" /> or <paramref name="previousLanguageId" /> is **null**.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage" /> attached property.
The dependency object on which to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage" /> attached property.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the new value for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage" /> attached property.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage" /> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> to set the input language of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager> pour définir la langue d’entrée d’un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> élément.

trans-unit.source: Raised when <paramref name="target" /> is **null**.
The dependency object for which to set the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage" />.
A Boolean value to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage" /> attached property to.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage" /> dependency property on the specified dependency object.
Raised when <paramref name="target" /> is **null**.
